messages.subject: Atlanta support groups
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 11:15:20 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes: Here is what an online aquaintance said about
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 11:15:20 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

Here is what an online aquaintance said about unschoolers in Atlanta:

"I honestly, don't know a good way to meet just unschoolers. I'm on the
board of directors for one support group here, Lifetime Learners of Georgia.
We're an inclusive group with a smattering of all styles. There is one other
group called Atlanta Alternative Education Network (AAEN) that has a lot of
unschoolers also. Tell her to check them out:
LLG - http://llg.freeyellow.com/
AAEN - http://www.mindspring.com/~lei/aaen/

It sounds like there are some unschoolers in the area....good luck!

Ren
